nodes.bodyText: There was weird spacing here, because it was including all the whitespace at the start of each line. This fixes that.
I noticed previously that this error would show up if other wasn't selected, if isSpecificPopulationValid was false (e.g., nothing was yet selected). This fixes that.
We had inconsistent numbering here, so I removed the number symbols where it wasn't consistent.
Added (Question 3) and (Question 4) per Karthik's request, to have consistency with labeling there.
can we keep this and change true to false? just to be sure that neither yes nor NO is selected by default?
